tool_description: UPI QR Code Generator API generates dynamic UPI QR codes.
name: UPI QR Code
title: UPI QR Code

api_list.name: Create QR code
api_list.description: Create a UPI QR code from provided data and returns an AWS S3 pre-signed URL to download the UPI QR image.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upi-qr-code1.p.rapidapi.com/createQr/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upi-qr-code1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://upi-qr-code1.p.rapidapi.com/createQr/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upi-qr-code1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
